He is not there anymore, now we see a PAIR OF LEGS teetering bizarrely, obscenely, then the legs fall to the floor. The shocked Magnifico hurries over to whatвЂ™s left of Eb but there is nothing to be done:

dialogues.speaker: YOU KILLED HIM
dialogues.text: Bayta stands there shaking...and holding her smoking BLAS (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Now we see the deformed body of Magnifico slowly rise and straighten, standing tall for the first time. Somehow his twisted spine has been repaired. His back is to Bayta as he says:

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: When did you know? A second before you pulled the trigger, I suppose. Well done. I was expecting, if you fired, that you would fire at me. It is not an easy thing to surprise aman of my peculiar talents. And Magnifico turns around. He mocks her, with a formal b

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Allow me to introduce myself. (short pause) I am the Mule. Bayta stands there, still aiming the blaster, frozen, una to move or speak. He has her.

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Poor Ebling. Thanks to me his mind was operating at peak efficiency for the first time in his life. of course, the process was killing him, but he would have lived long enough for my purposes...if not for you. MagnificoвЂ™s face does not look that different, but he i longer a grotesque joke. His ugly features have lost thei childlike quality. His fear is gone. His bearing is stron He steps close to Bayta, and looks at her, with great des

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The first time you saw me, you liked me, without my having to juggle your emotions. You were neither repelled nor amused. You liked me. Magnifico reaches out to Bayta and gently caresses her ch

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And so I stayed out of your mind. I couldnвЂ™t bring myself to tamper with it. My first -- and only -- mistake. Now he abruptly lets go of her. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I sense your...revulsion. How silly. I could make you love me very easily. It would be an artificial love, but there would be no difference between it and the real emotion. Not to you. Magnifico steps away from her then, and seems to reach ou with his mind. Sensing things.

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The fleet is here. My new second-in- command will arrive soon. Oh, here he comes, would you like to meet him? Bayta does not move. She just stands there. But her eyes reveal the fear her body canвЂ™t. And PRITCHER steps into view. We recognize the dead look his face. Seen it before on countless others. He is turne

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The brave Captain infiltrated my soldiers and tried to kill what you thought was the Mule. Just a shell into which I deposited a part of my mind, in the process giving birth to your вЂњMagnifico.вЂќ He steps back toward Pritcher.

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I am relieved to be whole again. Walking around like a frightened clown does grow rather tiresome. And now he commands his slave:

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Say hello to Bayta. After all, she loves you. Pritcher turns his head and looks at her, without express

dialogues.speaker: PRITCHER
dialogues.text: Hello. And he turns back to Magnifico. PRITCHER (CONTвЂ™D) The fleet is ready to depart on your command, sir. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO
dialogues.text: Very good, Captain. Very good. Magnifico has a final thought:

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look on the bright side, my dear. You have found your faith. Only a true believer in the Seldon Plan would kill to hide the location of the Second Foundation. BaytaвЂ™s eyes burn through him.

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I can feel the hate. I think you hate Hari Seldon as much as you do me. Maybe you picked the wrong side. I will find them, you know. If they exist I will destroy them. Magnifico leaves her there. She points a blaster at nothi

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Or do you really think I will be defeated by a man who took his last breath 1,000 years ago? A dead hand against a living will! Pritcher walks through the door, without turning back. Bu the Mule stops. He looks at her, one last time, pain and regret spreading over his face:

dialogues.speaker: MAGNIFICO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I will let you live. My foolish mistakes are my own. I will let you live...in the name of friendship. Then his expression hardens. He gives us one last look of bottomless hate.
